tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Chirag is excellent doctor with extensive knowledge in his field . He makes patient comfortable during treatment ...his guidence and response towards patient and their family members is also nice ...He is very much clear and listens to the pt. And attended very well.. he was clear enough in making us understand the problem of our mother and knee replacement was done as planned and as expected..he is not only greatly skilled in what he does but has an easy bedside manner is informative ...humble ...and cheerful..and carries with him a motivated team that makes the extra effort and goes the extra mile in patient comfort. We will always recommend him without hesitation to anyone we know who needs such medical help...thank to Dr. Chirag ...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Chirag Arora  is simply amazing. He is very much clear and listens to the patient and attended very well. He was clear enough in making us understand the problem of our mother and knee replacement was done as planned and as expected. We thank him for all the guidance and helping our mother to walk again well. Highly recommended üëå üëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I underwent an ACL surgery recently carried out by Dr Chirag arora. He handled my case superbly and addressed all my concerns and apprehensions very patiently.
The pleasent behaviour, confidence and apprachable nature makes him a great doctor.
** ** ********* ************* ***** *** **** *** ** * ******* ****** ******* I would definitely recommend him for sports injuries 
Thank you sir for helping me during my struggle of getting through the surgery and post surgery period.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mother suffered a shoulder injury following a fall. We consulted Dr chirag arora and surgical treatment was advised. He is a gem and very professional, thorough in his approach. Now after 6 wks, the recovery is on track. Must consult him for any shoulder issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My journey for an ACL surgery at CK Birla hospital with Dr chirag arora has been wonderful. He is very confident and approachable surgeon. The whole layout of options and recovery plan which he discusses with you prior to surgery is great.. Must visit for any knee sports injuries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My father Mr Subhash Chander Arora is over 70 years old and on 19th March 2024 he had knee surgery done successfully at CK BIRLA Hospital. Doctor Chirag is an exceptionally intelligent doctor with an encouraging and optimistic outlook. The patient becomes so confident that half of his disease is cured even before the treatment process begins. My father was worried initially but his team made it very easy. Our special thanks to Doctor Chirag Arora for guiding us on multiple fronts with his amazing credibility. Along with expertise and professionalism, these guys are also friendly and approachable.

Along with the doctors, we also found other staff decent, proactive and amazingly supportive. Assistance and instructions to the patient from the nursing staff were clear. Staff ensured that the patient was given utmost attention. Food service is extremely important for patient care in hospitals and we found this hospital to be quite good in this area as well.  maintains cleanliness throughout the day, several times to ensure that the ward/rooms remain disinfected. The patient support from the support staff was excellent. Thanks again Dr Chirag for your support and consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My wife Mrs. Suparna Biswas was admitted in CK Birla emergency dept on 15th March 2024 with severe shoulder multiple fractures. Since beginning to her complete recovery, she was under treatment of Dr. Chirag Arora.                                                 
 We were fortunate to have   Dr. Chirag for her treatment. He is a complete professional and is a very competent surgeon to take up any complicated shoulder fracture/ rehabilitation/replacement cases.  I think he is an asset for any hospital to get him in their panel   of doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I underwent an arthroscopic fixation (plating) surgery after my proximal tibia (knee) fracture. Surgery was performed by Dr. Chirag Arora at CK Birla hospital Gurgaon and I am so grateful to the doctor and his team for all the support and care during and after the surgery.

Dr. Chirag has been kind enough to answer all queries and he was very approachable throughout. I'm equally grateful to my physiotherapist Dr. Nitesh Badoni who put all his efforts for a successful rehab.

Dr. Chirag works closely with the physio team to keep an eye on the rehab journey which is very helpful and instills confidence in patient that we are getting the right care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Good doctor but i am not getting expected results as i am not getting any pain relief despite of one month gone
